description: This table stores historical patient vitals information for each medication order at the time the order was released. It should only be used for reporting on whether or not vitals information had been entered at that point in time.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the order record.

columns.name: WEIGHT_AT_RELEASE
columns.description: The patient's recorded weight in kilograms at the time the order was released.

columns.name: WEIGHT_REL_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The source category ID for the patient's recorded weight at the time the order was released.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Treatment plan weight


Past measured weight


Most current measured weight (actual)


Ideal body weight


Adjusted body weight


User entered weight


Lean body weight


Dosing weight


Other

columns.name: HEIGHT_AT_RELEASE
columns.description: The patient's recorded height in centimeters at the time the order was released.

columns.name: HEIGHT_REL_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The source category ID for the patient's recorded height at the time the order was released.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Treatment plan height


Past measured height


Most current measured height (Actual)


User Entry


Other

columns.name: BSA_AT_RELEASE
columns.description: The patient's calculated body surface area (BSA) in meters squared at the time the order was released.

columns.name: BSA_REL_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The source category ID for the patient's recorded body surface area (BSA) at the time the order was released.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Treatment plan BSA


Based on weight and height measured in the past


Based on most recent measured weight and height (actual)


User Entry


Based on ideal body weight and current/past measured height


Based on adjusted body weight and current/past measured height


Based on dosing weight and current/past measured height


Based on normalized BSA 1.7m2


Other
